title: Research Assistant (Data Science)
skills: Pandas, Cleaning Data, Analyzing Data, Excel, Client Relations, Time Management, Microsimulation
description: • Created class architecture and defined object interactions by using UML to document agent attributes

• Developed a microsimulation of Innisfil's town using SUMO and NETEDIT, which simulated existing transit service, serving up to 220,000 trips with various demand levels (130%, 150%, and 200%), as well as simulating a hybrid service model
• Utilized Python scripts along with Excel and XML to generate key simulation files and analyze simulation data
• Presented simulation results to clients and team members, effectively communicating findings and insights

title: Web/XR Developer

• Currently using the Figma design to build a functional website using WordPress, with a responsive layout, and user-friendly navigation.
• Currently learning XR development to prepare for the upcoming VR project at Kore Meta Inc, which involves working with Unity and C# to build immersive experiences.

title: Virtual Reality Consultant

• Worked closely with the team to understand their vision, providing suggestions on how to better their VR education.

title: Research Assistant (Web Application Development)
